Property description


Ward Walk Apartments, 2210-12 Ward Street is a 6 unit
complex offering a mix of 1 and 2 bedroom apartments. This 1960's building has
a clean and modern aesthetic with amenities such as a large gated garage
parking lot and adjacent laundry next door. Inside you'll find its spacious units have cozy hardwood
flooring, wall to wall carpet and wide windows. The large balcony is ideal for
a quiet moment or a book you've been meaning to finish. The kitchen features a
large double counter allowing enough space for a feast or just a place to
relax.


 


Currently, we have a stunning 2 bedroom unit with a private entrance, remodeled kitchen, high ceilings and brand new hardwood floors. This apartment not only has a remodeled eat-in-kitchen but also plenty of storage. This is a great unit and place to call home! 

Neighborhood InformationNeighborhood description

Ward St. is perfect for those who want to live where the
action is. The complex is very close to CAL UC Berkeley. There is plentiful
nearby shopping, ranging from Andronico's and Whole Foods grocery stores, to
Telegraph's trendy stores and street vendors. Just a little bit farther down
the road and you're right in the middle of the Elmwood/College shopping
district.The building is conveniently located just 6 blocks from the
U.C. Berkeley Campus, two blocks from CVS and the Downtown Berkeley Shopping
District.If you're looking to get out of town for a day trip Downtown
Berkeley BART is only a bike ride away.
